content: @WG-async-foundations Sorry for late notice, but I won't be able to make the meeting today due to a scheduling conflict. I think we'll have to cancel, but I'm setting aside time later today to do issue triage in this stream.
Thanks for the notice. Update: Got a section of docs in the pipeline in https://github.com/rust-lang/async-book/pull
..didn't get to triage during the day but going through a few issues now

Improve error message for "return type cannot contain a projection or Self..." #78600

Claimed by @csmoe

#[track_caller] does nothing on async fns #78840

The suggestion to forward #[track_caller] on to the poll function makes sense to me. Not prioritizing this since it's blocked behind closure support and doesn't seem oft requested.
Bad diagnostic for Send bound on Future coming from async fn in foreign crate #78543
This one is definitely one I want to fix, and probably isn't too hard
I'm not sure how big the impact is
But I suspect lots of people will hit it over time
Deduplicate code that finds the return type of a future #78755
This is a cleanup issue I made. It's pure refactoring if anyone is interested in doing that.
Okay, I think that's all for now. Just a couple more recent ones left but it might be good to handle those with the full group.
